Title: Hungary’s long-term reliance on Russian piped supplies could limit its LNG demand
Description: Unlike other EU countries, Hungary has no intention to reduce its dependence on Russian pipeline gas imports, which could limit its reliance on LNG. So far this year, Hungary has boosted its Russian pipeline supplies more than its LNG imports
Author: DE

Title: Kogas issues tender for December-January LNG supplies
Description: Korea’s state-owned Kogas has issued a tender to buy an unspecified number of cargoes for delivery between end-December and January, leaving market participants to try and ascertain the scale of the firm’s demand for the period. The tender closes on Oct. 19.
Author: CK
